channel.title: Coin Exchange
channel.description:
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/j96nbq.png[/img]
How do I change the name of these items, no they are not coins they are different the ID's are 1002, 1003, 1004.
I do not have Class8.java I have ItemDef.java
[shadow=red,left]Thanks, Elfbow[/shadow]

item.title: Coin Exchange
item.dc:creator: @Elfbow Elfbow
item.description:
@Elfbow wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:2, topic:436112”]I’m not sure, never tried it without models

but try this:

case 1002: itemDef.name = "Money Asshole!"; itemDef.description = "I'll poop money".getBytes(); break;

try to add this in itemdef

and once again, i’m not sure but try it.[/quote]

ItemDef.java:560: error: orphaned case case 1002: ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
